name: JustADream
description:
Controls: .Mouse Movement - Camera Movement .Right Mouse Button - Sleep .Left Click - Toggle Lamp .Escape - Pause The Game Jam: .As seen in the list below, this game did rely on many factors to be somewhat "complete". I am quite happy with the finished product, but it definitely could be improved. For example, the pause menu looks like it was thrown together in 2 minutes, as I just didn't have enough time to get more than the base functionality. I did spend quite along on polishing, optimizing and improving the graphics, which could have been levelled out to suit my time a bit more if I planned out the more important goals better.

.Many Useful Assets Were Used For This Project. Credits To The Talented Artists:

3D Assets Used:
